Bulleted and numbered lists
.
1.  List item.
2.  List item.
-   List item.
-   List item.
.
<ol>
<li><a ¶="1" id="¶1">1</a>List item.</li>
<li><a ¶="2" id="¶2">2</a>List item.</li>
</ol>
<ul>
<li><a ¶="3" id="¶3">3</a>List item.</li>
<li><a ¶="4" id="¶4">4</a>List item.</li>
</ul>
.

Paragraphs inside numbered lists
.
1.  List item paragraph.

    List item paragraph.

2.  List item paragraph.

    List item paragraph.
.
<ol>
<li>
<p><a ¶="1" id="¶1">1</a>List item paragraph.</p>
<p><a ¶="2" id="¶2">2</a>List item paragraph.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><a ¶="3" id="¶3">3</a>List item paragraph.</p>
<p><a ¶="4" id="¶4">4</a>List item paragraph.</p>
</li>
</ol>
.

Paragraphs inside bulleted lists
.
-   List item paragraph.

    List item paragraph.

-   List item paragraph.

    List item paragraph.
.
<ul>
<li>
<p><a ¶="1" id="¶1">1</a>List item paragraph.</p>
<p><a ¶="2" id="¶2">2</a>List item paragraph.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><a ¶="3" id="¶3">3</a>List item paragraph.</p>
<p><a ¶="4" id="¶4">4</a>List item paragraph.</p>
</li>
</ul>
.

Single-line block quotes
.
> Blockquote text.

> Blockquote text.
.
<blockquote>
<p><a ¶="1" id="¶1">1</a>Blockquote text.</p>
</blockquote>
<blockquote>
<p><a ¶="2" id="¶2">2</a>Blockquote text.</p>
</blockquote>
.

Paragraphs inside block quotes
.
> Paragraph text.
>
> Paragraph text.
.
<blockquote>
<p><a ¶="1" id="¶1">1</a>Paragraph text.</p>
<p><a ¶="2" id="¶2">2</a>Paragraph text.</p>
</blockquote>
.

Multi-level lists
.
1.  List item text.
    -   Level 2.1
    -   Level 2.2
2.  List item text.
    1.  Level 2.1
    2.  Level 2.2
.
<ol>
<li><a ¶="1" id="¶1">1</a>List item text.
<ul>
<li><a ¶="2" id="¶2">2</a>Level 2.1</li>
<li><a ¶="3" id="¶3">3</a>Level 2.2</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><a ¶="4" id="¶4">4</a>List item text.
<ol>
<li><a ¶="5" id="¶5">5</a>Level 2.1</li>
<li><a ¶="6" id="¶6">6</a>Level 2.2</li>
</ol>
</li>
</ol>
.
